content: small amount of yarn remaining work the last hald double_crochet to achieve a smooth edge single crochet across the next 3 stitches and slip_stitch across the next 3 stitches leave enough yarn to weave the end cut your yarn and draw the tail through the last stitch to fasten_off finishing use the blunt tapestry needle to weave the yarn tail ends so it looks invisible sew the foundation join to close the gap between stitches and create a smooth edge this project will benefit from blocking to block dissolve a small amount of wool wash in a basin of cool water place the completed work in the basin press to submerge soak for about 30 minutes support the work and drain the water press and squeeze the water out do not twist support the wet work as you place it to dry on a flat surface gently ease into shape according to the finished dimensions allow it to dry undisturbed out of direct sunlight designer and pattern information valerie moreno www knittingfairygodmother com ravelry designs knitting fairy godmother knittingfairygodmother@gmail com special thank you to laura & kevin regan and created 4 u by laura c valerie moreno knitting fairy godmother designs 2023 every effort has been made to ensure accuracy and clarity of this written pattern should you find errata please email so i may update and correct the pattern v1 e 10/2023
